title: 水桶服务端CraftBukkit-1.7.2-R0.3(Build #02999)下载
author: aewfw
txt_content:
本帖最后由 aewfw 于 2014-2-3 00:27 编辑 

Changes since the previous Development Build (1.7.2-R0.3 build #2998)
自上一个版本的变化:(BUG&ADD)相较于上一个版本#2998
[Bleeding] Add support for ThrownExpBottle and Fish to launchProjectile(...). Fixes BUKKIT-1536
[Bleeding] Re-add EntityShootBowEvent lost in e93a3eb3b4c5234e3e3936bc697d566a42d3b30e .FixesBUKKIT-4214
Add methods to get and set arrow knockback(添加方法来获取和设置箭头击退效果). Adds BUKKIT-5103
Add setCritical and isCritical methods to CraftArrow.java. Adds BUKKIT-5113
[Bleeding] Implement ProjectileSource API.(实现射弹源码的API) Addresses BUKKIT-1038, BUKKIT-1156
[Bleeding] Implement setCharged and getCharged for WitherSkull.(实现设定带电并得到带电的干枯骷髅)Addresses BUKKIT-3060
[Bleeding] Directly set direction in EntityFireball.(可以直接给实体火球设定方向)Fixes BUKKIT-1154
[Bleeding] Use correct yaw and pitch when spawning arrows. Fixes BUKKIT-3320
[Bleeding] Fix support for several entities in World.spawn(). Fixes BUKKIT-3284
[Bleeding] Store correct block type when hitting blocks. Fixes BUKKIT-5209
点此下载不能下载的请翻墙
